website_summaries.verdict: Fun for younger kids to gain confidence and coordination prior to starting downhill ski lessons.
pros: Secure tightly to sturdy snow boots and include a back binding to prevent the heel from lifting
Parents can easily pull or push kids across snowy areas
cons: Ski poles can be a bit intimidating for toddlers
Not for downhill skiing, but sliding around flat areas only
Plastic may crack lengthwise if subjected to too much pressure
Kids over age 3 may be too big for these

customer_reviews.title: She is 22 months and both my husband and I are avid skiers - so we wanted to get her comfortable on skis ASAP so we can get her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skis! She is 22 months and both my husband and I are avid skiers - so we wanted to get her comfortable on skis ASAP so we can get her on the real mountains when she is ready. These are great for little ones to get a feel for having 2 sticks strapped to their feet. We just went to our local park and pulled her along the pathway and she seemed to pick it up pretty quickly. These will be great for the next year of learning before hitting the real slopes.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 2.5 year old's first time on skis
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for an agile toddler. They are not anything fancy and for sure are just "trainer" skis, but for sliding around and getting the hang of being on skis, these are great! She is just wearing her Kamik snow boots with them and has mostly just been on flat terrain with them.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Mom

customer_reviews.title: these are perfect for our 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Being avid skiers, these are perfect for our 2 year old. They fit snow boots very well and are very sturdy. I recommend to anyone who wants to teach their toddler how to ski.

product_meta.title: Kids First Plastic Snow Skis & Poles Age 2-4 with Bindings - Fun Beginer Skis 90cm
feature_bullets: Snowflake Skis With Poles - Great skis to get them out on the snow - Perfect for Beginers Age 2 - 4
Wide skis - Round tips - No metal edges - 28" long
Flexable binding with webbing straps to hold boot in place - Matching Metal poles - Scaled base for grip
Use with most snow boots or shoes - Suitable for Age 2 - 4

Please note these are fun skis and not suitable for groomed pistes but great for areas around the ski resorts and base sections or fun areas. Great to grab in place of a sledge for some super snow fun!
